Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CORPORATIONS, AUTHORITIES AND COMMISSIONS

Title: Extends the authority of NYSARC, Inc., to maintain bonds
Summary: Extends the authority of NYSARC, Inc., to maintain bonds until 2028.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend chapter 373 of the laws of 1998, amending the public authorities law relating to the powers of NYSARC, Inc., in relation to the effectiveness thereof
